## Dataview key-value properties


```{julia}
#| echo: false
#| output: false
#| warning: false
repo = pwd() |> dirname
```



```{julia}
using Obsidian, ObsidianGenealogy
dir = joinpath(repo,"test", "assets", "presidents-vault")
genvault = genealogyVault(dir)
```

Get the triples:

```{julia}
kvlist = kvtriples(genvault.vault)
```





## The `NoteKV`


```{julia}
kvitem = kvlist[end]
```

```{julia}
wikiname(kvitem)
```

```{julia}
key(kvitem)
```

```{julia}
value(kvitem)
```
